Question
========

Out of every 100 people, 10 will be randomly chosen who will each win a €5 gift certificate. What then is the standard deviation of the amount won amount for one person?

Answerlist
----------

* € 0,50
* € 1,50
* € 2,25
* € 2,50
* € 4,50

Solution
========

Answerlist

* € 0,50: Incorrect
* € 1,50: Correct

* € 2,50: Incorrect
* € 4,50: Incorrect
